post.excerpt:
### Introduction

Before sending real messages to your audiences, you can send a trial message with the **Trial Experience** feature for free and without requiring approval. This trial is available only for first-time registration with a WhatsApp Business account

previous.title: Get Started with WhatsApp Business Dashboard

next.title: How to Register a New WhatsApp Number
